page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {FARMING Cont This investment in mechinisation resulting increase in productive efficiency has brought widespread change to the D-Block and throughout the area.Fewer men are needed to work the land, yet the population of Stalham has expanded rapidly in the last 15 years. {EMPLOYMENT A randam sample of 32 houses in the D-BLOCK were surveyed to investigate work patterns. Significantly,only one man worked directely on the land. This compares with the county council estimate of only 3% across the county. Only 7% worked in the primary or extractive sector, 20% in the secondary or manufacturing sector but 73% worked in the tertiary or service industries: estate agent, R.A.F. at Coltishall, insurance, accountant.
